text: Taras Hryhorovych Shevchenko (; was born 25 February 1814 (9 March New Style), Moryntsi, and died February 26 1861 (March 10, New Style), St. Petersburg. He was a Ukrainian poet, writer (playwright, prose writer), artist (painter, engraver), public and political figure. Academician of the Imperial Academy of Arts (1860). ==References== Category:1814 births Category:1861 deaths Category:Ukrainian writers Category:Ukrainian painters Category:Ukrainian poets Category:Playwrights Category:Cherkasy Oblast Category:19th-century artists
title: Taras Shevchenko
